text: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ أَعۡدَآءِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّارُۖ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا دَارُ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يَجۡحَدُونَ

translation.en: That is the recompense of the enemies of Allah - the Fire. For them therein is the home of eternity as recompense for what they, of Our verses, were rejecting
translation.id: Demikianlah balasan (terhadap) musuh-musuh Allah (yaitu) neraka; mereka mendapat tempat tinggal yang kekal di dalamnya sebagai balasan atas keingkaran mereka terhadap ayat-ayat Kami
